comments:
Description:
If there is a dataset returned no records, bind with chart, then error occurs.

Steps to reproduce:
1.Create a datasource and dataset. Set filter to make return no record.
2.Pull a chart to the layout, bind with the dataset, error occurs.

Error log:

This looks like a regression. The engine used to return a null IRowSet if there 
was no row before, I believe it should not throw an exception in any case when 
we try to evaluate the expression. Reassigning to data team.
IRowSet is provided by Engine team.
Fixed. Changed IDataRowExpressionEvaluation interface and implementaion, added return value for first() method.

Preview in layout, ok.
Preview in HTML, error pops up.
See the error log:
